name: Forest Run (Demo - WIP)
description:
Hi!

That's first demo for my new game! For now demo is very simple, but I plan support this version for 1 month, and change status for normal demo from demo-wip.

But how can you play? That's very simple like demo:
Left and right arrows - side moving
Spacebar - Jump

Your task is simple. You have to go to end of level.

Version 0.0.1:
- Only one level.

Version 0.0.2:
- Still only one level, but with little improvements.
- Little jump power increased.
- Added nice coin!
